scripts.start-watch: npm run watch && nodemon --watch build build/server.js
scripts.test: npm run build && lab -S -C -v -t 50 -a code build/tests
scripts.test-watch: npm run watch && nodemon --watch build --exec 'lab -S -C -v -t 50 -a code build/tests'
scripts.coverage: npm run build && lab -S -C -v -t 50 -a code -r html -o coverage.html build/tests
scripts.coverage-watch: npm run watch && nodemon --watch build --exec 'lab -S -C -v -t 50 -a code -r html -o coverage.html build/tests'
